name: Dragonfly (Thomas Bringer)
description:
Dragonfly is a two-player asymmetrical experience. The pilot must keep control of the spaceship and react to alerts. From the control room, the operator must activate commands and give information to the pilot. Neither the pilot nor the operator can complete the mission on their own: they must work together and communicate.

Dragonfly is a short online cooperative multiplayer experience for Windows. Two devices are required to play. It is not allowed to look at one's teammate's screen. The two players must hear each other.

Made in 48 hours by Thomas Bringer fort GMTK Gam Jam 2021 (Theme: Joined Together).

Credits: All design, code and graphics made in 48 hours by Thomas Bringer.

Sound effects by Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/assets/sci-fi-sounds https://www.kenney.nl/assets/interface-sounds and by Lalks https://freesound.org/people/Lalks/sounds/316839/
